articles.content: Croatia knocked off the tournament favorite Brazil on Friday, and now they face another huge challenge on Tuesday when they take on Argentina in a 2022 FIFA World Cup semifinal. The Croatians were runners-up in 2018, losing 4-2 to France in the final... [4752 chars]
